Here is hoping for a App-update that enables full screen support for the new 2018 iPad pros

What a great and unique puzzle game. I havenâ€™t found one as satisfying as Monument Valley which was a bit too easy. This game tested both my problem solving skills and fine motor skills. It was the perfect difficulty. Delightfully frustrating at times. My only tiny minor complaint is that I would have preferred to play on an iPad. With my iPhone 6+, I still had to scroll a bit more than Iâ€™d have liked too but it added to the challenge.
This game was really fun but it lasted less than 10 hours for me. If you add a mode where we can make puzzle and play the puzzles of other people I will give it 5 stars.

First off, this game is a blast.  There are instructions but part of it is figuring out for myself.  If u arenâ€™t a self-starter, u could become frustrated and quit, but if u like to feel the glorious feeling of personal achievement for completing a difficult task?  This games for you.  Not easy, trust me, but rewarding. 
   I love it because it one time pay, not additional fees to play, no coins, no jewels and stuff to buy. Especially love that there is not a weekly fee to pay to play.  This business of paying a fee to play EACH week is outrageous.  However this game is a ONE time pay, and play all ya want.  Everyday, 24/7 and no money required accept to buy the app.  One time fee!  Loving it!
   Like a challenge.....this games for you!
